summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Dearborn Street, from 20th Avenue South to 21st Avenue South, by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 96828 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
